page.title: 11EVENTS -LOCAL NEWS
page.content: Compared to other small towns and villages, Northleach receives very little publicity. Just recently it has featured more because of the proposed closing of the excellent school. There were three reports and one death in a week's papers in july 1985 of the Gloucestershire echo. 1. There was a complaint about the plan to close Westwoods Grammar School, written by a concerned parent. 2. Traction engines, Road Rollers and motor cars eg. Triumph Southern Tourer were among the collection gathered for the 11th Northleach Steam Fair held for charity. 3. The Cotswold Countryside Collection set up in 1981 in Northleach received one of 16 certificates of distinction for being one of the best national tourist attractions of 1984.
